Key Match Events: Jeremy Sarmiento scored just before halftime to put Ecuador in front
Jhonder Cadiz equalized in the 64th minute with a goal from a substitute
Eduard Bello sealed the victory for Venezuela in the 74th minute
Post-Match Reflections: Venezuela earned their Group B campaign off to a winning start
Ecuador played most of the match with 10 men after Enner Valencia was sent off in the 22nd minute
Miscellaneous Highlights: Captain Enner Valencia was sent off in the 22nd minute for a high boot
The match took place at Levi's Stadium in Santa Clara, California, USA
